definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: These trees adapted more easily to the red earth here.
sentences.chinese: 这些树更适应这里的红土。

sentences.english: Clay warehouse near 11 o clock at night, Sun Weijun decorate plan.
sentences.chinese: 夜里11点红土仓库附近，孙维君布置作战计划。

sentences.english: From which you get your strength. The red earth of Tara .
sentences.chinese: 你是从这样东西那里获得了力量，它是桃瑞园的红土。

sentences.english: I raced in the red clay, making dust clouds behind me.
sentences.chinese: 我在红土奔跑，使尘埃云落在我的身后。

sentences.english: Lateritic crust of basalts is of zonal texture.
sentences.chinese: 玄武岩红土壳具帝状结构。

sentences.english: We brothers will tread down the soil then it becomes a solid red soil bridge.
sentences.chinese: 然后叫我们兄弟踩结实，就成了坚固的红土桥了。

sentences.english: Ordinarily he could see to the red road and the oak tree and the low brick wall.
sentences.chinese: 窗外能看到的通常就是红土路和栎树以及矮矮的砖墙。

sentences.english: After breakfast back to Lumut Jetty by ferry.
sentences.chinese: 早餐后乘客船回返红土坎码头。

sentences.english: Nanxiong has abundant resources of granite and clay.
sentences.chinese: 南雄有丰富的花岗石和红土资源。

sentences.english: The red earth here contains an estimated 24 billion tons of iron ore.
sentences.chinese: 这里的红土含有大概240亿吨的铁矿。

sentences.english: Laterite ores can be approximately divided into two categories:the limonite and the humus soil.
sentences.chinese: 红土镍矿大致可分为褐铁矿型和腐植土型两类。

sentences.english: It's this from which you get your strength. The red earth of Tara .
sentences.chinese: 你是从这样东西那里获得了力量，它是桃瑞园的红土。

sentences.english: The neotectonic period is the principal metallogenic period of the laterite gold deposits.
sentences.chinese: 新构造运动期是云南红土型金矿的重要成矿期。

sentences.english: China owns certain amounts of nickel-bearing laterites, but the grade is relatively low.
sentences.chinese: 我国虽有一定量的红土镍矿，但品位较低。

sentences.english: The weathered residual lateritic red soil along the alignment is reasonably uniform in nature.
sentences.chinese: 红土型风化残余沿线红色土壤性质合理均匀。

sentences.english: The lateritic gold deposit is a new gold industrial type.
sentences.chinese: 红土型金矿是一种新的金矿工业类型。

definition: sandy beach or river bank/sand dune/sandy land
loess (yellow sandy soil typical of north China)
